snippet: An investigation into the Manhattan accident that left Michael Simermeyer dead will focus on the machine’s maintenance and operation.
abstract: Investigation into the collapse of a Midtown Manhattan crane, killing construction worker Michael Simermeyer, will focus on the machine’s maintenance and operation; crane, owned by Yonkers Contracting, was subject to annual inspections by the city's Buildings Dept, which has hinted that records show poor maintenance of the crane over a period of time.
lead_paragraph: An investigation into the Manhattan accident that left Michael Simermeyer dead will focus on the machine’s maintenance and operation.

headline.seo: Crane That Collapsed Had Defects in Hoisting System, Officials Say
headline.main: City Officials Cite Defects in Hoisting System of Crane That Collapsed, Killing a Worker
headline.print_headline: City Officials Cite Defects in Hoisting System of Crane That Collapsed, Killing a Worker
